newsentry.title: MyCoRe Workshop
newsentry.message: The MyCoRe User Workshop 2016 took place in Leipzig. See workshop site for results and presentations.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Announcement
newsentry.message: MyCoRe is now using the Git version control system and the code is provided in a repository at GitHub.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
newsentry.message: Since 27. May 2016 our LongTermSupport release for 2016 is available.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Update
newsentry.message: MIR and Skeleton are using the current LongTermSupport release version 2016.06.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: Now online: “Hamburger Professorinnen- und Professorenkatalog” at Hamburg University.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
